techmeme.title: Google adds "smarter search" to Gmail for Android, iOS, and the web, using AI to show the most relevant results instead of showing them in chronological order (Abner Li/9to5Google)
Sources: Microsoft chose not to exercise a ~$12B option to buy more data center capacity from CoreWeave; OpenAI snapped up the contract on March 10 (Rohan Goswami/Semafor)
Germany's Munich Re agrees to acquire digital insurance company Next Insurance for $2.6B; Next Insurance has raised ~$1.2B from Capital G, Redpoint, and others (Mary Ann Azevedo/TechCrunch)
Source: Insight Partners is set to reap ~$2.7B from the pending sale of Wiz to Alphabet, a 15.5x return on its invested capital, based on its ~8% stake in Wiz (Gillian Tan/Bloomberg)
Anthropic adds web search in preview for Claude 3.7 Sonnet, available now for paid US Claude users, with support for free users and more countries coming soon (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
